title: List All Delegates
description:
You can obtain all Delegates through this paginated API. Note that all registered Delegates are returned in this response, not just the top 51 forging Delegates.
If a Delegate Node is offline, it is still returned through this API; as the `delegate` resource is not concerned with the actual nodes, only with the on-chain registrations and wallets.

page.description: The number of the page that will be returned.

limit.description: The number of resources per page.

offset.description: The number of resources to be skipped.

orderBy.description: The column and order by which the resources will be sorted.

username.description: The username of the delegate to be retrieved.

address.description: The address of the delegate to be retrieved.

publicKey.description: The public key of the delegate to be retrieved.

votes.description: The votes of the delegate to be retrieved.

votes.from.description: The minimum votes of the delegates to be retrieved.

votes.to.description: The maximum votes of the delegates to be retrieved.

isResigned.description: The resignation status of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.produced.description: The number of produced blocks of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.produced.from.description: The minimum number of produced blocks of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.produced.to.description: The minimum number of produced blocks of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.id.description: The last produced block id of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.height.description: The last produced block height of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.timestamp.epoch.description: The last produced block epoch timestamp of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.timestamp.epoch.from.description: The minimum last produced block epoch timestamp of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.timestamp.epoch.to.description: The maximum last produced block epoch timestamp of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.timestamp.unix.description: The last produced block unix timestamp of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.timestamp.unix.from.description: The minimum last produced unix epoch timestamp of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.timestamp.unix.to.description: The maximum last produced unix epoch timestamp of the delegate to be retrieved.

blocks.last.timestamp.human.description: The last produced block timestamp of the delegate to be retrieved.

production.approval.description: The production approval rate of the delegate to be retrieved.

production.approval.from.description: The minimum production approval rate of the delegate to be retrieved.

production.approval.to.description: The maximum production approval rate of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.fess.description: The forged fees of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.fess.from.description: The minimum forged fees of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.fess.to.description: The maximum forged fees of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.rewards.description: The forged rewards of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.rewards.from.description: The minimum forged rewards of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.rewards.to.description: The maximum forged rewards of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.total.description: The forged fees and rewards of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.total.from.description: The minimum forged fees and rewards of the delegate to be retrieved.

forged.total.to.description: The maximum forged fees and rewards of the delegate to be retrieved.
